title: Voice Chat
body:
So voice chat is now available. Does anyone know if a recent ban effects the voice chat. For example if i recently got banned, am i unable to use voice chat?

I am currently in a chat with my friends but i cannot hear anyone and they can hear me. Might be an issue with the client or something?

If someone could help that would be great Thanks :)

replies.body: same problem for me is a voice chat bug im not using onboard sound maybe it doesn't like my soundcard
Most likly to do with the client, the chat only works with pre mades incase you didn't know

Voice chat works perfectly for me and my mates,

However, I have noticed if you don't have a mic the game can see you can't hear anything at all.

I am hoping they'll be able to rectify this

Hey dude - could you give me some information on your computer/the hardware you are using? It would also be awesome if you could grab your leagueclient logs and vivox logs from a session when you had this problem - to find the logs, you go to your root league client folder > logs >league client logs > sort by most recent and grab leagueclient.log, then back out back to logs > vivox logs > sort by most recent and grab the most recent vivox log
there is a voice log and the one your asking for i also have no sound but others hear me i also have a soundblaster z
